x.axis: properties of axis like: angle, color, title, size...Maybe from ggplot theme

scale.domain: Range of the xaxis. Should be a two numbers array like [100,300]

bin.bins: The number of bins of bar or histogram. In ggplot2, the default bins is 30. In vega, default bins is 10. So we use 30 as out default bins
bin.binwidth: A number, width of a bin

encoding.color: like x except axis and scale
encoding.weight: If weight is NULL, bar will use count aggregate; If weight defined, bar will use the field and sum aggregate
